sqls.name: SELECT_MULTIPLE_COLUMNS
sqls.desc: 查询多列，列名带as，表名带ass
sqls.sql: select c1 as a1, c2 as a2, 1 as a3 from table as tableA where 1 = 1

sqls.name: select-number-started-columns
sqls.desc: 查询列名是数字开头的列

sqls.name: select-literal-columns
sqls.sql: select 1, -1.1 as aa, '2' as b from table where 1 = 1

sqls.name: select-method-column
sqls.desc: 查询方法调用的列，并且带as
sqls.sql: select now() as t from table where 1 = 1
